languages.text: [Взять Соломона за руку] "Я оценил{mf||а} твой жест. Твои слова забыты. Пойдем".
[Take Solomorne's hand] "Your gesture is well received. Your words are forgotten. Come."
languages.original_text: [Взять Соломона за руку] "Я оценил{mf||а} твой жест. Твои слова забыты. Пойдем".

languages.text: [ソロモーンの手を取る]「君の気持ちは受け取った。言葉はいらない。来い」
languages.original_text: [Take Solomorne's hand] "Your gesture is well received. Your words are forgotten. Come."

traits.locale_text: [ソロモーンの手を取る]「君の気持ちは受け取った。言葉はいらない。来い」

languages.text: [Solomornes Hand nehmen] "Ich weiß Eure Geste zu schätzen. Eure Worte sind vergessen. Kommt."
languages.original_text: [Take Solomorne's hand] "Your gesture is well received. Your words are forgotten. Come."

traits.locale_text: [Solomornes Hand nehmen] "Ich weiß Eure Geste zu schätzen. Eure Worte sind vergessen. Kommt."

languages.text: [Prendre la main de Solomorne] « Votre geste me va droit au cœur et vos paroles sont oubliées. Venez. »
languages.original_text: [Take Solomorne's hand] "Your gesture is well received. Your words are forgotten. Come."

traits.locale_text: [Prendre la main de Solomorne] « Votre geste me va droit au cœur et vos paroles sont oubliées. Venez. »

languages.text: [Tomar la mano de Solomorne] «Aprecio mucho el gesto. Considere olvidadas sus palabras. Venga aquí».
languages.original_text: [Take Solomorne's hand] "Your gesture is well received. Your words are forgotten. Come."

traits.locale_text: [Tomar la mano de Solomorne] «Aprecio mucho el gesto. Considere olvidadas sus palabras. Venga aquí».

languages.text: [握住索罗蒙的手]“你的姿态我很满意，你的话我已经忘光了，快跟我来吧。”
languages.original_text: [Take Solomorne's hand] "Your gesture is well received. Your words are forgotten. Come."

traits.locale_text: [握住索罗蒙的手]“你的姿态我很满意，你的话我已经忘光了，快跟我来吧。”

languages.text: [Solomorne'un elini tut] "İyi niyetini görmüş oldum. Sözlerini unuttum bile. Gel."
